title:
Complete Metric Approximation Property For Mixed $q$-Deformed
  Araki-Woods Factors
authors: Panchugopal Bikram, Rajeeb Mohanta and Kunal Krishna Mukherjee
abstract:
The main result of this paper is to establish the $\text{weak}^*$ completely
metric approximation property ($w^*$-CMAP) for the mixed $q$-deformed
Araki-Woods factors for all symmetric matrices with entries $-1< q_{i,j}< 1$,
using an ultraproduct embedding of the mixed $q$-deformed Araki-Woods factors.
